description:
The Course is to Learn to Make your own website on your own doing it step by step without any previous technical expertise watching videos in plain english

Everything from how to register your website, how to select the right name for your website, how to find the right web hosting company what to consider while selecting the right web hosting company is there in the course and the course does this step by step you go on building a website as you go step by step into the course.

1) We will make a Simple Blog website for a Hobbiest

2) We will make property listing website for a real estate agent

3) We will make the website look more better and enhance its functionality using plugins
title: Create Your Website with Wordpress no experience required
